member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.NotesController.CreateNote(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send file to server, currently only pdf supported. Please send this as form-data. Real parameters are: file, name, description, price, course. Please do not get fooled by swagger that spreads file on more properties.

member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.NotesController.DownloadRequest(System.Guid)
member.summary: Try to download the file, if user has bought note then the response is file itself (blob file result). Every browser should be able to open this blob file and it stays in memory while user session is on. If user hasn't bought the file, then the response is bad request OR (in future) auto-redirect to homepage.

member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.UniController.GetAllUniversities(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all universities for given voivodeship

member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.UniController.GetAllCourses(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all courses for given university

member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.UserController.GetUserInfo(System.Guid)
member.summary: returns limited data (that should be visible for everyone)
